column3: Apple will fight for customers BEIJING
column5: Apple Inc's  long-awaited iPhone agreement with China Mobile Ltd  may deliver little more than a fleeting revenue jolt for the U.S. giant.

column2: CORRECTED-Italy watchdog may fine BlackRock on Telecom Italia-reportItaly watchdog may fine BlackRock on Telecom Italia: reportUPDATE 1-Italy may fine BlackRock on Telecom Italia stake -reportWatchdog tells BlackRock to show its hand before Telecom Italia EGM * SEC says BlackRock raised Telecom Italia stake to 10.1 pct  Watchdog tells BlackRock to show its hand before Telecom Italia EGM * SEC says BlackRock raised Telecom Italia stake to 10.1 pct * BlackRock raised its stake in Telecom Italia in NovemberWatchdog tells BlackRock to show its hand before Telecom Italia EGM * SEC says BlackRock raised Telecom Italia stake to 10.1 pct   UPDATE 1-Italy may fine BlackRock on Telecom Italia stake -reportWatchdog tells BlackRock to show its hand before Telecom Italia EGM * SEC says BlackRock raised Telecom Italia stake to 10.1 pct  Watchdog tells BlackRock to show its hand before Telecom Italia EGM * SEC says BlackRock raised Telecom Italia stake to 10.1 pct * BlackRock raised its stake in Telecom Italia in NovemberWatchdog tells BlackRock to show its hand before Telecom Italia EGM * SEC says BlackRock raised Telecom Italia stake to 10.1 pct  MILAN Italian watchdog Consob may fine the world's biggest money manager BlackRock Inc  for not informing the regulator soon enough that it had increased its stake in Italy's Telecom Italia
